00005 #include <math.h>
00006 #include "ral_encoder.h"
00007 #include "ral_odometry.h"
00008 #include "ral_pid.h"

00011 struct Pos Odometry_Pos;
00021 void Odometry_Init(int encoderL, int encoderR){ 
00022     Odometry_Pos.x = 0;
00023     Odometry_Pos.y = 0;
00024     Odometry_Pos.theta = 0.0;
00025     Odometry_Pos.encoderChannelL = encoderL;
00026     Odometry_Pos.encoderChannelR = encoderR;
00027         Odometry_Pos.encoderLastCntL = Encoder_ReadBuffer(Odometry_Pos.encoderChannelL);
00028         Odometry_Pos.encoderLastCntR = Encoder_ReadBuffer(Odometry_Pos.encoderChannelR);
00029     return;
00030 };
00031 
00038 void Odometry_Update(){
00039         int LCount;
00040         int RCount;
00041         double LCONST;
00042         double RCONST;
00043         double LDistance;
00044         double RDistance;
00045         double delta_Distance;
00046         int LnewCount;
00047         int RnewCount;
00048 
00049     LnewCount = Encoder_ReadBuffer(Odometry_Pos.encoderChannelL);
00050     RnewCount = Encoder_ReadBuffer(Odometry_Pos.encoderChannelR);
00051         
00052         //do odometry update by the delta cnt in L/R encoders
00053         LCount = LnewCount - Odometry_Pos.encoderLastCntL;
00054         RCount = RnewCount - Odometry_Pos.encoderLastCntR;
00055 
00056         Odometry_Pos.encoderLastCntL = LnewCount;
00057         Odometry_Pos.encoderLastCntR = RnewCount;
00058 
00059     LCONST = 2 * ENCODER_L_RADIUS * PI / ENCODER_COUNT; 
00060     RCONST = 2 * ENCODER_R_RADIUS * PI / ENCODER_COUNT; 
00061     LDistance = LCount * LCONST;
00062     RDistance = RCount * RCONST;
00063     delta_Distance = (LDistance + RDistance) / 2.0;
00064     Odometry_Pos.x += delta_Distance * cos(Odometry_Pos.theta * PI_180);
00065     Odometry_Pos.y += delta_Distance * sin(Odometry_Pos.theta * PI_180);
00066     Odometry_Pos.theta -= (LDistance - RDistance) / ENCODER_DISTANCE * C180_PI;
00067     return;     
00068 };
00069 
00077 void Odometry_Set(double x, double y, double theta){
00078     Odometry_Pos.x = x;
00079     Odometry_Pos.y = y;
00080     Odometry_Pos.theta = theta;
00081     return;
00082 };
